statements.select: select * from MPSdetails where CustomerId in(select CustomerId from customer where (id>=#customerStart# or #customerStart# is null) and (id<= #customerEnd# or #customerEnd# is null)) and ((MPSheaderId >= #mpsheaderIdStart# or #mpsheaderIdStart# is null) and (MPSheaderId<=#mpsheaderIdEnd# or #mpsheaderIdEnd# is null)) and MPSheaderId in (select MPSheaderId from MPSheader where (MPSStartDate between #dateStart# and #dateEnd#) or (#dateStart# is null and #dateEnd# is null)) and (ProductId=#productId# or #productId# is null)
select isnull(sum(MPSdetailssum),0) from MPSdetails where InvoiceXODetailId=#value#
select isnull(MPSHasSingleSum,0) from MPSdetails where MPSdetailsId=#value#

select * from MPSdetails where CustomerId in(select CustomerId from customer where (id>=#customerstart# or #customerstart# is null) and (id<= #customerend# or #customerend# is null)) and mpsheaderid in (select mpsheaderid from mpsheader where MPSStartDate between #startdate# and #enddate# ) order by MPSheaderId desc
